About Me

BIO

My name is Khoi Nguyen, a passionate Vietnam & Canada based web application developer. I first discovered my interest in programming when I was in my mid-20s and I have worked towards improving my own skills, getting into industry and furthering my experience ever since. I specialize in developing website and mobile application.

Web Application Development

Full Stack Developer

Utilizing Node.js, Express, MongoDB and JavaScript Frameworks like React, Angular and Vue.js to create full-stack web applications and deploying final products onto cloud hosting services like Heroku, GitHub Page by using Git version control. Databases are stored on mLab and Google's Firebase. Projects: CreativeTube and Shopping List

UX/UI Design

Front End Developer

Using Bootstrap 4 and Materialize UI along with SASS to design elegant user interfaces. Projects: kTunes (Music Service like iTunes)

Mobile Application

Mobile Developer

Building cross-platform mobile app for both Android and iOS devices via using React-Native which is a powerful framework.
